features: 【4MP Security Cameras with Full-Color Night Vision】 Unlike the 2K ptz cameras on the market, our upgraded 4MP outdoor cameras deliver more crystal-clear images and support 10X magnification. These outdoor wired cameras come equipped with Spotlight features, ensuring vividly visible images even during the darkest nights. (Offer three night vision modes, including infrared, full-color, and smart night vision.)

【AI Detection & 2-Way Communication】 The enhanced AI algorithm of our security cameras system ensures smart motion detection, sound and light alarms, and human recognition, reducing false alarms. The outside cameras includes a built-in noise-resistant microphone and speaker for clear two-way audio communication.

【Wider View & IP66 Waterproof】 The 360 ptz security cameras wireless outdoor allows for capturing wider areas and recording 4MP ultra-clear videos, providing comprehensive protection for your outdoor and indoor safety. This IP66 waterproof PTZ camera is an excellent choice for use in rainy days, snowy conditions, and extreme weather. Perfect for parking lot surveillance, warehouse monitoring, both indoor and outdoor use, and more.

【24/7 Recording & APP Control】 Enjoy uninterrupted video streaming effortlessly and remote control through your phone via the app. Recordings can be saved via SD card (not included, supports a maximum of 128GB) or cloud storage. Never miss a moment and enjoy the freedom to playback recordings.

【Multi-User Online Access and Warranty】 Focusing on home security, our outdoor security camera supports multi-user control for your loved ones. The GUOANVISION service team provides a one-year warranty and 24-hour online email support for all our outdoor, indoor, and home security cameras.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 24 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4MP Supper HD View Stream Built with the latest lenses and CMOS sensors, it records 4MP HD video to provide more vivid and ultra-clear image quality. Two-Ways Audio Built-in noise resistant miscophone and speaker to achieve clear two-way calls without muffled sound or poor audio. Make push-to-talk calls on the app whenever you want. Share Moment for Home Security The outdoor security camera can support online control by multiple family members to keep an eye on the home security system.

IP66 Waterproof Cameras Even in extreme weather, the camera records everything on the patio perfectly. It is the security guard of the patio. Wireless WiFi Outdoor Camers This outdoor security monitor can be connected wirelessly via wifi to avoid all the safety hazards associated with cumbersome wires. 360° PTZ Cameras for Home Security Built-in HD CMOS sensor accurately captures moving objects and instantly alerts you via your cell phone. You can control the camera at any time from the mobile app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a big review writer unless a product stands out. This is a good camera with an excellent picture quality. It seemed complicated at first then I went over the directions step by step with unit plugged in on floor upside down in living room setting up for a long frustrating experience. 5 minutes later I was controlling the unit. This is my first ever camera so I just sat and went through the menus and hit every button to see what it did. I set my preferences and other options as there are as few or as many that you want depending on your preferences. For $42 I am impressed with this unit. If you need a simple camera with the ability to record,alert and do what this does. You found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to turn off ADS
reviews.reviewText: Camera is actually decent. I was impressed with how inexpensive they are. One thing that was a big turn off to me is it will show you ads by default but I figured out a way to turn them off. Once you have the app installed, go under tools in settings and there is an option to turn off the ads so you don’t have to view them every time you open the app. I’m going to go ahead and give the camera five stars even though it’s not the best quality but for the price you cannot beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality 4k resolution dual cam that requires subscription for cloud storage
reviews.reviewText: This dual cam pic was quite clear & resolute. I especially liked the fact that you can have the dual cams pointing in opposite directions & can scan the sight line. Overall for the price point it is a well made cam,app is pretty easy to use & responds quickly. Took off a star for the whole monthly subscription cloud storage part,should be 1 low price for the year like other cams & am a little leary of exactly where the cloud storage is located considering this is a Chinese product & thats not stated anywhere,but you can use the SD card feature instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice security camera!
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a couple different brand,style security cameras for year's. This is a great addition to my existing system. Easy to connect to my wifi, easy app to use. I have had zero issues with this unit yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sharp image, fairly easy set up, but.....
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so I could see people approaching me door. The good is that the photo quality is pretty amazing. The wi-fi based interface, on your phone was fairly easy to navigate and set up. The "motion detector" option, however, isn't as reactive as I'd expect (it doesn't track well, or very quickly). I think as part of a larger system this would be an excellent component but for my purposes was not great.One big complaint is that that AC cord is only about 24" long, meaning you either have put in an outlet up high or run it off an extension cord, which is sortof silly. All that said, it's not hugely expensive and does offer a GREAT image of whatever you are pointing it at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice feature set. Weirdly short power cord.
reviews.reviewText: As a monitoring camera, this thing has a lot of great features. Two lenses - one wide angle and the other on a controllable rotating ball, awesome low light abilities, and the ability to store locally or in the cloud.What's weird though is that it has a y-split cable coming off it allowing you to connect it to a cat cable and/or a power cable that's about a foot long and then the power cable that has a boxed power supply in the middle is about another foot long.The wifi on it works great but unless you plan to use it through a powered cat connection instead, be prepared to break out the extension cords because you're not likely going to have a power plug anywhere near where you'll be putting this.That feels like a really odd choice to me.Anyway, setup was easy with the app. It requires you to set up an account but everything does these days. Once it's set up it gives you the option to store locally or in the cloud. To help push you towards a subscription service for the cloud, it gives you these two options and then will inform you there is no micro-SD card installed after you choose the local option. There is no local storage built in so be prepared with the SD card.It's not a huge deal, especially with such great features at this price point but the way it all happens with setup feels a little like a shakedown.Once up and running everything works great, though.I got this for monitoring my 3D printers remotely. The FDMs are all running octoprint and have cameras pointing at their print beds but the resin printers do not. The ability to see all of them in the wide view and the ability to look to each one of them and zoom with the dome is awesome.Also, unlike Octoprint which requires paid third party solutions to broadcast offsite and can take a while to load, this one works pretty reliably while offsite which is really great.Despite the shortcomings (one of them literal), it's really hard to grumble with how good this camera is at under $50.
